condition.name: Equal to
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is equal tothe values in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.

condition.name: Not equal to
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is not equal to the value in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.

condition.name: Greater than
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is greater than a value in cell B1; otherwise it returns FALSE.

condition.name: Less than
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is less than in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.

condition.name: Greater than or equal to
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is greater than or equal to the values in cell B1; FALSE otherwise.

condition.name: Less than or equal to
condition.description: The formula returns TRUE if a value in cell A1 is less than or equal to the values in B1; FALSE otherwise.
